=====Usage notes=====
* In a [[passive-voice]] sentence, {{lang|zh|被}} is placed after the subject and before the doer of the action. The doer of the action is placed before the verb or can be omitted.
* A [[passive-voice]] sentence with {{lang|zh|被}} is negated with {{zh-l|沒有}}.
*: {{zh-x|我們 沒有 被 告知 他 從 哪裡 來。|We weren't told where he came from.}}
